this_title: Η κηδεία του τέως βασιλιά Κωνσταντίνου
trans_title: 希腊国王康斯坦丁二世的葬礼
I kideia tou teos vasilia Konstantinou
The Funeral of Constantine II of Greece
introduction: Constantine II, the last king of Greece, was laid to rest in a funeral service in Athens on Monday, with European royalty in attendance.
